text: ow karyayabahula kala simawak pahu kala.
2012 agosthu 5 wana dinata yedi athi 117 wana samastha lanka dahampasal dinayata samagamiwa mema nawa daham pasal dhajaya nirmanaya kara atha.

2013 wasaredi lama sanwardhana ha kantha katayuthu amathya dhuraya daru thissa karaliyadda mahatha ema wasare parlimeinthuweidi kala prakashayaka lama apayojana pilibadawada sadahan kaleya.ohu prakasha kala andamata 2012 wasare apayojanayata lakwa athi darawan ganana 7418 ki.2013 warshaye paminili 10,273 k ha 2014 warshaye paminili 10,315 pamana lama aarakshana adhikariyata labi atha.2015 wasare mayi masa wana wita labi athi pamanili pramanaya 3,219 k bawa wartha wei.mei atharin wadi paminili sankhyawak lingika apayojana samibandhayeni.
